message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  This is my final offer. Let me know your decision.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. This is my final offer. Let me know what you think.
